game.name: A-10C: Advanced Aircraft Training Qualification Campaign
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, 캡션 이용 가능, VR 지원, 컨트롤러 일부 지원
game.shortDescription: The A-10C Advanced Aircraft Training Qualification campaign puts you in the cockpit of an A-10C Warthog, and tests your ability to use the aircraft's weapon systems successfully.Based on real world qualification requirements you will fly 10 performance check rides to execute against pre-defined perf
